panels.content:
# Site Usage Monitor
A snapshot of user activity
panels.description: User View History is required for any view statistics on these panels. To enable User View History for your account, contact your Customer Success Manager.

options.content:
# User Activity Report
A snapshot of user activity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
CASE p.description 
	WHEN "Administrator"
	THEN p.description 
	WHEN "Expert"
	THEN p.description 
	WHEN "Answers Moderator"
	THEN "Moderator"
	WHEN "Guide Moderator"
	THEN "Author" 
	WHEN "Full Moderator"
	THEN "Author & Mod"
	WHEN "Basic Moderator"
	THEN p.description 
	WHEN "Contributor"
	THEN p.description 
END as "User Type", 
u.join_date*1000 as time_sec,
count(*) as "# of Users"
FROM global_users u
LEFT JOIN user_privileges up on u.userid = up.userid
LEFT JOIN privileges p on up.privilegeid = p.privilegeid
WHERE up.privilegeid is not null
AND u.enabled = 1
and u.login not like "%@ifixit.com"
and u.login not like "%@dozuki.com"
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR u.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR u.userid = $USERID)
GROUP BY p.description

union all

SELECT "Standard User" as "User Type",
u.join_date*1000 as time_sec,
count(*) as "# of Users"
FROM global_users u
LEFT JOIN user_privileges up on u.userid = up.userid
LEFT JOIN privileges p on up.privilegeid = p.privilegeid
WHERE up.privilegeid is null
AND u.enabled = 1
and u.login not like "%@ifixit.com"
and u.login not like "%@dozuki.com"
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR u.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR u.userid = $USERID)

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM global_users u
LEFT JOIN user_privileges up on u.userid = up.userid
LEFT JOIN privileges p on up.privilegeid = p.privilegeid
WHERE  u.enabled =1
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR u.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR u.userid = $USERID)
and u.login not like "%@ifixit.com"
and u.login not like "%@dozuki.com"

SELECT u.join_date as time_sec, count(*) as "New Users"
FROM global_users u
WHERE u.enabled = 1
and u.login not like "%@ifixit.com"
and u.login not like "%@dozuki.com"
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR u.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR u.userid = $USERID)
GROUP BY date_format(from_unixtime(u.join_date), "%m-%y")
order by from_unixtime(u.join_date) asc

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM global_users u
LEFT JOIN user_privileges up on u.userid = up.userid
LEFT JOIN privileges p on up.privilegeid = p.privilegeid
WHERE  u.enabled =0
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR u.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR u.userid = $USERID)
and u.login not like "%@ifixit.com"
and u.login not like "%@dozuki.com"

Select count(distinct inviteid) from user_invites
where user_invites.email not like "%dozuki.com%"
and user_invites.email not like "%ifixit.com%"

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, categories, and guides.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(historyid)
FROM user_history
left join (SELECT guideid, revisionid, device, created_date from guide_meta where created_date between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2629743) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() ) gm on user_history.docid=gm.revisionid


where user_history.event = 'new_guide'
and created_date between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2629743) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP()
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR user_history.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR user_history.userid = $USERID)
and ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR gm.device = $CATEGORYID)
and ($GUIDE_ID = 'All Guides' or gm.guideid = $GUIDE_ID)

panels.title: New Guides Last 30 Days

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, categories, and guides.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(historyid)
FROM user_view_history
left join guide_current on guide_current.guideid=user_view_history.docid
left join guide_revisions using(guide_revisionid)
left join guide_meta on guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid=guide_meta.revisionid


where 
user_view_history.doc_type = 'GUIDE'
and user_view_history.date between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2629743) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP()

and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR user_view_history.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR user_view_history.userid = $USERID)
and ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR guide_meta.device = $CATEGORYID) 
and ($GUIDE_ID = 'All Guides' OR guide_meta.guideid = $GUIDE_ID)

panels.title: Guide Views Last 30 Days

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, and categories.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(historyid)
FROM (select * from user_view_history 
where doc_type = 'WIKI'
and date between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2629743) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP()
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
) uvh
INNER join (select wikiid as docid, title, namespace from wikis where namespace="TOPIC") w using(docid)




where ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR w.title = $CATEGORYID)

panels.title: Category Views Last 30 Days

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, and categories.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(historyid)
FROM (select * from user_view_history 
where doc_type = 'WIKI'  
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and date between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2629743) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP()
) uvh

INNER join (select wikiid as docid, namespace from wikis where namespace="WIKI") w using(docid)


left join (select wikiid, related_wikiid as docid from wiki_related) wr using(docid)
left join (select wikiid, title from wikis where namespace="TOPIC") wt using(wikiid)



where ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR wt.title = $CATEGORYID)

panels.title: Wiki Views Last 30 Days

targets.rawSql:
Select count(distinct a.userid)
-- ,a.userid, a.username, a.login, from_unixtime(edit_date) 

from

(select user_history.userid, global_users.username, max(date) as edit_date, global_users.login from user_history  left join global_users on user_history.userid = global_users.userid group by user_history.userid ) a

where edit_date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'

and a.login not like "%dozuki.com%"
and a.login not like "%ifixit.com%"
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR a.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR a.userid = $USERID)
-- group by userid
order by userid asc

Select count(distinct a.userid)
-- ,a.userid, from_unixtime(view_date) 

from

(select user_view_history.userid, max(user_view_history.date) as view_date, global_users.login from user_view_history 

left join global_users on user_view_history.userid = global_users.userid 

where user_view_history.date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'


group by user_view_history.userid


) a

where  view_date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'

and a.login not like "%dozuki.com%"
and a.login not like "%ifixit.com%"
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR a.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR a.userid = $USERID)
-- group by userid

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, category, and date range.

targets.rawSql:
select uvh.date*1000 as time_sec, "Guide Views" as metric, count(uvh.historyid) as value


from (select * from user_view_history 
where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
and doc_type="GUIDE" 
and date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'
group by userid, docid, date
) uvh

inner join 
(select userid, login, username 
from global_users 

where 
($USERID='All Users' or $USERID=userid) 
and login not like "%dozuki.com%"
and login not like "%ifixit.com%" 
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
) gu using (`userid`)
left join (select guideid as docid, max(revisionid) as maxrev from guide_meta group by guideid) mr using(docid)
left join (select guideid as docid, revisionid as maxrev, device from guide_meta group by revisionid) gm using(maxrev)

where 


($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR gm.device = $CATEGORYID)

group by date_format(from_unixtime(uvh.date), "%m-%y")

order by uvh.date asc

-- left join (select userid, historyid, date from user_view_history group by historyid) uvh on uvh.userid = u.userid

select uvh.date*1000 as time_sec, "Wiki Views" as metric, count(uvh.historyid) as value


from (select * from user_view_history 
where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
and doc_type="WIKI" 
and date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'
group by userid, docid, date
) uvh

inner join 
(select userid, login, username 
from global_users 

where 
($USERID='All Users' or $USERID=userid) 
and login not like "%dozuki.com%"
and login not like "%ifixit.com%" 
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
) gu using (`userid`)

INNER join (select wikiid as docid, namespace from wikis where namespace="WIKI") w using(docid)
left join (select wikiid, related_wikiid as docid from wiki_related) wr using(docid)
left join (select wikiid, title from wikis where namespace="TOPIC") wt using(wikiid)

where ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR wt.title = $CATEGORYID)

group by date_format(from_unixtime(uvh.date), "%m-%y")

order by uvh.date asc

-- left join (select userid, historyid, date from user_view_history group by historyid) uvh on uvh.userid = u.userid

select uvh.date*1000 as time_sec, "Category Views" as metric, count(uvh.historyid) as value


from (select * from user_view_history 
where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
and doc_type="WIKI" 
and date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'
group by userid, docid, date
) uvh

inner join 
(select userid, login, username 
from global_users 

where 
($USERID='All Users' or $USERID=userid) 
-- and login not like "%dozuki.com%"
-- and login not like "%ifixit.com%" 
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
) gu using (`userid`)

INNER join (select wikiid as docid, title, namespace from wikis where namespace="TOPIC") w using(docid)

where ($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR w.title = $CATEGORYID) 

group by date_format(from_unixtime(uvh.date), "%m-%y")

order by uvh.date asc

select uh.date*1000 as time, "Activity" as metric, count(uh.historyid) as value


from (select * from user_history where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)) uh



group by date_format(from_unixtime(uh.date), "%m-%y")

order by uh.date asc

panels.title: User Views Over Time

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, and date range.

targets.rawSql:
Select view_date*1000 as time_sec, count(distinct userid) as value, 

concat(monthname(from_unixtime(view_date))," ",year(from_unixtime(view_date)))  as metric

-- "Users Viewing Content" as metric



from (select user_view_history.historyid, user_view_history.userid, user_view_history.date as view_date from user_view_history 
 where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)  group by historyid
) uvh

left join global_users gu using(userid)



where
view_date BETWEEN '${__from:date:seconds}' AND '${__to:date:seconds}'

and gu.login not like "%dozuki.com%"
and gu.login not like "%ifixit.com%"

-- group by year(from_unixtime(view_date)), month(from_unixtime(view_date)) order by year(from_unixtime(view_date)), month(from_unixtime(view_date))

group by date_format(from_unixtime(uvh.view_date), "%m-%y")
order by view_date asc

panels.title: Users Viewing Content

panels.description: Filtered by teams, users, and date range.

targets.rawSql:
select uh.date*1000 as time, "Activity" as metric, count(uh.historyid) as value


from (select * from user_history where ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)) uh



group by date_format(from_unixtime(uh.date), "%m-%y")

order by uh.date asc

panels.title: User Activity Over Time

targets.rawSql:
Select * from (select u.username as "Username", u.userid, u.login as "Email",

CASE up.privilegeid
	WHEN 1 THEN "Admin"
	WHEN 7 THEN "Author"
	ELSE "Standard"
END as "Role", 

u.join_date*1000 as "Account Created On", 
-- ses.status, 

case
when u.enabled=1
then "Active"
When u.enabled=0
Then "Disabled" 
end as "Status",  

uh.date*1000 as "Last Activity",
uvh.date*1000 as "Last View"
-- ses.ip, 




from global_users u



left join sessions ses on ses.userid = u.userid and ses.status="ACTIVE"  

left join user_privileges up on up.userid = u.userid
left join (select userid, max(date) as date from user_history group by userid) uh on uh.userid = u.userid
left join (select userid, max(date) as date from user_view_history group by userid) uvh on uvh.userid = u.userid
-- left join user_invites on user_invites.userid











union all

select "N/A" as "Username",  "N/A" as userid, email as "Email", 
CASE privilege
	WHEN 1 THEN "Admin"
	WHEN 7 THEN "Author"
	ELSE "Standard"
END as "Role", 
"Pending Invite" as "Account Created On", "Invited" as "Status", "N/A" as "Last Activity",
"N/A" as "Last View"  
from user_invites) t

where 


 ( t.`Last Activity` >= '${__from:date:seconds}' or t.`Last View`  >= '${__from:date:seconds}'  or t.`Account Created On` >= '${__from:date:seconds}' )

and 

 (t.`Last Activity` <= '${__to:date:seconds}' or t.`Last View`  <= '${__to:date:seconds}'  or t.`Account Created On` <= '${__to:date:seconds}' )
and ($USERID = 'All Users' OR userid = $USERID)
and ($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM))
and t.`Email` not like "%dozuki.com%"
and t.`Email` not like "%ifixit.com%"

list.definition: select CONCAT(name, "  ", "Team ID:", teamid) AS __text, teamid AS __value FROM teams
list.label: Team
list.name: TEAM
list.query: select CONCAT(name, "  ", "Team ID:", teamid) AS __text, teamid AS __value FROM teams

list.definition: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, "  ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users where userid in (select userid from user_teams where ($TEAM=teamid or $TEAM='All Teams'))
list.label: User
list.name: USERID
list.query: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, "  ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users where userid in (select userid from user_teams where ($TEAM=teamid or $TEAM='All Teams'))

list.definition: select  "All Categories", list.title as "Category" from (select distinct title from wikis where wikis.namespace="TOPIC") list order by 'All Categories', title ASC
list.label: Category
list.name: CATEGORYID
list.query: select  "All Categories", list.title as "Category" from (select distinct title from wikis where wikis.namespace="TOPIC") list order by 'All Categories', title ASC

list.definition:
select guide_text.guideid AS __value,   CONCAT(guide_text.title, "  ", "Guide ID:",  guide_text.guideid) AS __text    from guide_current 
left join guide_revisions using(guide_revisionid)
left join guide_text using(gt_revisionid)
left JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid

where device in (select device from guide_meta where ($CATEGORYID=device or $CATEGORYID='All Categories'))
list.label: Guide
list.name: GUIDE_ID
list.query:
select guide_text.guideid AS __value,   CONCAT(guide_text.title, "  ", "Guide ID:",  guide_text.guideid) AS __text    from guide_current 
left join guide_revisions using(guide_revisionid)
left join guide_text using(gt_revisionid)
left JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid

where device in (select device from guide_meta where ($CATEGORYID=device or $CATEGORYID='All Categories'))
